Sentencas: A process for synthesis of ZrO2 based ceramics by coprecipitation, for application in solid oxide fuel cell is described.
Titulo: Synthesis of ZrO2-based ceramics for applications in SOFC

Sentencas: Precursors preparation, precipitate treatment by azeotropic distillation and ceramic processing are also presented.
Titulo: Synthesis of ZrO2-based ceramics for applications in SOFC

Sentencas: Zirconia powders containing 3 and 9 mol% Of Y2O3 and other additives such as TiO2 were prepared, pressed by uniaxial compaction and sintered at 1500degreesC for one hour.
Titulo: Synthesis of ZrO2-based ceramics for applications in SOFC

Sentencas: The apparent densities of the pellets produced were determined by an immersion technique based on the Archimedes principles.
Titulo: Synthesis of ZrO2-based ceramics for applications in SOFC

Sentencas: Ceramics crystal structure was verified by X-ray diffraction, their microstructure was observed by seaming electron microscopy.
Titulo: Synthesis of ZrO2-based ceramics for applications in SOFC

Sentencas: The chemical composition was analyzed by energy dispersive spectroscopy.
Titulo: Synthesis of ZrO2-based ceramics for applications in SOFC

Sentencas: The results showed that the ceramic bodies are dense with fine grains and the titania addition causes grain growth and, above the solubility limit, a formation of a second phase.
Titulo: Synthesis of ZrO2-based ceramics for applications in SOFC
